title: asnet6
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

asn.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the netblock.

net6.description: The IPv6 address range assigned to the ASN.

net6:min.description: The first IPv6 in the range assigned to the ASN.

net6:max.description: The last IPv6 in the range assigned to the ASN.
